name: Mr.Buggy's Taco Place Official
description:
Instructions: a and d to move between kitchen and front desk.

Click Bun Bun on the front desk when hes awake to make him go back to sleep make sure you have enough money ($30) 

Mr.Skinny is in the kitchen drag the food to his hammer and to the bag to get it ready however you must clean the hammer every now and then to make sure its not to dirty

becareful tho you can only clean the hammer so many times.

s to skip calls.

nights 2 and above:

there's a camera in the camera (weird ik) if the light is red click the alert or when you see someone without an id on them.

there's a save system so if you lose you can retry by pressing continue (don't close the tab tho it will reset your progress.
